name: @debrief/shared-types
description: Shared types for Debrief ecosystem with constrained GeoJSON FeatureCollections

scripts.build:ts: npm run build:ts:track && npm run build:ts:point && npm run build:ts:annotation && npm run build:ts:featurecollection
scripts.build:ts:track: quicktype -s schema schema/track.schema.json -o derived/typescript/track.ts --lang typescript --top-level TrackFeature
scripts.build:ts:point: quicktype -s schema schema/point.schema.json -o derived/typescript/point.ts --lang typescript --top-level PointFeature
scripts.build:ts:annotation: quicktype -s schema schema/annotation.schema.json -o derived/typescript/annotation.ts --lang typescript --top-level AnnotationFeature
scripts.build:ts:featurecollection: quicktype -s schema schema/featurecollection.schema.json -o derived/typescript/featurecollection.ts --lang typescript --top-level DebriefFeatureCollection
scripts.build:python: npm run build:python:track && npm run build:python:point && npm run build:python:annotation && npm run build:python:featurecollection
scripts.build:python:track: quicktype -s schema schema/track.schema.json -o derived/python/track.py --lang python --top-level TrackFeature
scripts.build:python:point: quicktype -s schema schema/point.schema.json -o derived/python/point.py --lang python --top-level PointFeature
scripts.build:python:annotation: quicktype -s schema schema/annotation.schema.json -o derived/python/annotation.py --lang python --top-level AnnotationFeature
scripts.build:python:featurecollection: quicktype -s schema schema/featurecollection.schema.json -o derived/python/featurecollection.py --lang python --top-level DebriefFeatureCollection
scripts.build:types: npm run build:ts && npm run build:python
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:types && mkdir -p dist && npx tsc
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dist
scripts.test:generated: npm run test:generated:ts && npm run test:generated:python
scripts.test:validators: npm run test:validators:ts && npm run test:validators:python
scripts.test: npm run test:generated && npm run test:validators && npm run test:schemas
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run test

author: Debrief Team
